Ingredients.5: 1  Hass avocado - peeled, pitted, and sliced

Ingredients.7: 1 small bunch fresh cilantro, chopped, or to taste (Optional)

Ingredients.8: 1 pinch salt and ground black pepper to taste

Ingredients.9: 1 dash hot sauce, or to taste (Optional)

Directions.1: Place tortillas on a microwave-safe plate. Place shredded Cheddar cheese in the center of each tortilla, towards 1 end. Microwave on high power to melt cheese, 20 to 30 seconds.

Directions.2: Heat butter in a skillet over medium heat. Whisk eggs together in a bowl. Pour into the skillet; cook and stir until eggs are set, about 5 minutes.

Directions.3: Place eggs over melted cheese on tortillas; top each with avocado, tomato, and cilantro. Season with salt and pepper. Top with hot sauce.
